type.name: standard
type.summary:
Exponential Moving Average (EMA) of price or any other specified OHLCV element.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.

type.name: increment-lookback
type.summary:
Get the next incremental Exponential Moving Average (EMA) value, using the lookback period.
See documentation for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Last EMA value, from the prior period.

type.name: increment-k
type.summary:
Get the next incremental Exponential Moving Average (EMA) value, using precalculated K-value.
See documentation for more information.
type.param: k-value is 2 / (N + 1) where N is the lookback periods.
Last EMA value, from the prior period.

type.name: increment-quote
type.summary:
Get the next incremental Exponential Moving Average (EMA) result, using TQuote.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
